item.title: I Hate Parenthesis
item.description: I hate parenthesis. I think they’re a huge curse for the readability and writability of both code and math. Consider this code snippet: sqrt(pow2(scale.x * (this.x - that.x)) + pow2(scale.y * (this.y - that.y))) This is incredibly difficult to parse for a reader of this code, especially when the parenthesis stack up like at the end. This example is fairly tame with the parenthesis only going three layers deep, but it can get worse in the wild.
